name: KF Interactive GmbH
description:
We are KF Interactive - "KF" as in Kumpels & Friends ("buddies & friends").
As a digital agency, we implement versatile digital solutions on the web or as mobile apps for our clients.
We build interactive experiences with a strong focus on brand awareness and user experience. 
No matter if it is a web community or an internal mobile solution to assist your employees, we strive for elegant and user-friendly solutions that integrate well in existing ecosystems.
